JPMorgan's Jamie Dimon and Sen. Elizabeth Warren Team Up to Bash Crypto https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/12/06/jpmorgans-jamie-dimon-and-sen-elizabeth-warren-team-up-to-bash-crypto/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines WUAW2A54LVH2JNOTCLDU2XPUGE Jesse HamiltonJPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon has never been shy about trashing crypto, even while his giant Wall Street bank became a leader in using blockchain technology to move billions.
